scripts.say: Canal Stronghold - Surrounding waters
I'm Bunker Hill of the Essex-class, and I am in charge of the stronghold reinforcement fleet.
(whispers) Um... What should I say next...
Ahem... Thank you for coming all the way out here...
You don't have to read off the script, you know...
We're all family here, so just take it easy.
Long time no see, Bunker Hill.
Indeed. It's good to see you all, Essex, Intrepid, and, uh...
Just Enterprise is fine. Don't worry about the formalities.
Thanks. In any case, looks like everyone is here except for Bluegill, who's still out on patrol.
Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer, Cooper here! You all must be tired from sailing all the way down here! ...Wait, where's the Commander?
The Commander is with Saratoga for a joint operation with the Northern Parliament. We wouldn't be able to recall the Commander for a task like this.
That's too bad~ I heard your commander was a total stud~
So, the main hero isn't here, huh... I suppose this is one of those side stories when the sidekicks get to take front and center.
Don't worry about it, Reno! As long as I'm here, everything's gonna go swimmingly!
That Northern Parliament, where engines freeze over and stop working? Guh... just hearing about it makes me cold.

Even if it gets below zero there, it's not like we don't have airfields that get that chilly as well. Trust me, there's no way an engine would suddenly freeze over and stop working just because of the temperature.
You sure know your stuff... Ahaha.
You didn't come across as the knowledgeable type, Marblehead...
Ahem... Let's continue our chat inside.
Booyah! We also have some tropical punch inside!
Since we're just standing around here anyways, we might as well head inside.
That's right. Besides, we need to get around to drafting our rescue plan... Right, Enterprise?
Huh? Oh, sorry. I was thinking about something.
Oh? Is something bothering you, Enterprise?
It's no big deal. After this, let's all help search.
There's a lot of territory to cover just to the east of the canal. We're going to have our work cut out for us.
